dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6247 IH: To modify the scope of the Office of the Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mills (for himself and Mr. Issa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To modify the scope of the Office of the Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction.

section.header: Modifications to the Office of the Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction
section.text: Section 1229(m)(1)(B) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008 (Public Law 110â€“181; 5 App.) is amended by striking the reconstruction of Afghanistan and inserting assistance for the benefit of the Afghan people.
